snippet: China’s central bank unexpectedly cut regulated bank lending rates by nearly a third of a percentage point on Thursday, and made a rule change that could further reduce borrowing rates.
lead_paragraph: China’s central bank unexpectedly cut regulated bank lending rates by nearly a third of a percentage point on Thursday, and made a rule change that could further reduce borrowing rates.

headline.main: China Cuts Rates in Bid to Reverse Slowdown
